DESCRIPTION: Puts a #yDoll into combat. You may have up to #b10 #yDolls at once.
The value used for a #yDoll's effects. #yDolls are #yDestroyed upon reaching 0 #yCharge.
Dolls perform a passive effect at the end of each turn based on their #yCharge, and then lose #b1 #yCharge. #yDolls are #yDestroyed upon reaching #b0 #yCharge.
A #yDoll that deals damage to the nearest enemy at the end of your turn.
A #yDoll that deals damage to ALL enemies in a line at the end of your turn.
A #b0 cost #ySkill card with #yRetain which summons a #yShanghai #yDoll and #yExhausts.
A #b0 cost #ySkill card with #yRetain which summons a #yHourai #yDoll and #yExhausts.
